scenes.background: You apologized to Monica and offered to handle the task together. Bob overhears and comments:
scenes.description: Now you want to help? Sounds like damage control.

options.text: I just want to ensure the task is completed efficiently.
options.analysis: You focused on task completion, showing good social skills and motivation, but your empathy and self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: I understand your concern, Bob, but I'm genuinely trying to help.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the comment and clarified your intention, demonstrating strong perception and empathy.

options.text: If you think it's damage control, feel free to take over.
options.analysis: You responded with a suggestion, showing motivation and social skills, but your empathy and perception were lower.
